channel.title: Power of Greass mistake?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Power of Greass mistake?" - Either Wiki has a typo, or I found a bug. I'd like to get clarification before reporting.

item.title: Power of Greass mistake?
item.content:encoded:
On the Pizzawitch Mission, Add Some Toppings!, you can get an Unknown Pizza as a drop. Since my level and range are too low to complete this normally, I used Flying Thunder God Technique along with Power of Greass since I only had 11 stamina left. This is the resultâ€¦

http://img441.imageshack.us/i/82302511.png/

Is this a typo on BVS Wiki, or is it a bug?
